Blog.post: Lol, I am here to torture... lol. I have been over to SJ's in Worksop where we went to skeggy... :P... Its a nice house ;) Anyways... had fun going to all the amusements and stuff. Lydia will never forgive me for the bingo I am sure :(. Well... I made an idiot of myself... as usual. :P... lol... Toblerone melted in my bag and covered alot of my clothes!!! :@ SJ: Answer to your question that u wanted Ian to find out... Nothing [WWM]. (Drowning Pool, Bodies) Lol, sed it to u while u were asleep in the car :S... I also kno alot more... ;) [THX BTW] but that is not to leave my fingers/lips I am a lil ill atm... lol, felt alright in the morning but now feel like shite. meh. Got More to say but can't think. OK, I hate myself... If you were me wouldn't you? I mean... I am a complete Arse Hole... GRR... I dunno why SJ stickes with me... I am soo soo thankfull she does, everyday is a blessing although I am always preparing for the worse. Shit, Why am I saying this... I really do care for her... when I heard of that feckin dog I was soo worried

I wanna get psycho! Woo... am well awake and strange today... I have been listening to Disturbed on 1/4 blast which with my speakers disturbs the neighbours ;) : P Been Walkies with Matt! Melbourne... 3hrs... fuxin hck that is tirin... I need to wait till someone is home again to ask abooot wednesday cos I dunno if am doin nethin... then there is like 3:45 dental on Tues... thats plans through the fuxkin window. 16:44 - Marie's Brother's retarded friend is at the door.

21:15 - Drowning deep in my sea of loathing... broken your servant I kneel. Meh... Am bored... God I am sooo sadistic I know this song off by heart now: I wanna get psycho Run you little bitch I want your power glowing, juicy flowing, red hot, meaning of life It's not enough to have a little taste I want the whole damn thing now Can you dig it? Need to get psycho wanna hear you say it say, you want it, need it Don't wanna wait until we finish the show It's not enough, you hunger for more You're one twisted little fuck And now you anna get psycho with me Decide Give in I wanna get psycho Scratch my itch Give me your power glowing, juicy flowing red hot, meaning of life It's not enough to have a little piece I want the whole damn thing now Can you dig it? Need to get psycho Wanna hear you scream Tell me to take you, scare you, fuck you After we finish the show It's not enough, you listening whore? You're one twisted little fuck And now you wanna get psycho with me Decide Give in I can feel the blood, flowing through my veins Spilling on my soul And now the hunger's getting bigger Come a little closer now pretentious whore and pull my trigger Free the violence that is building in me I say now end of the ride, murder suicide Is how I've been feelin'lately Come a little closer my pretentious whore I'm living with a feeling that I can't ignore Come a little closer my pretentious whore I'm living with a feeling that I can't ignore Come a little closer my pretentious whore I'm living with a feeling that I can't ignore And the need to get psycho is not a question to me 21:34 - Received TXT from SJ... Just replied... she is in hostpital and is frustrated. *sigh*... I dunno what to say anymore... I have been shocked by it all cos like I know how dangerous this sorta thing can be am sure she is ok... well what has she been tellin me while I keep askin? Why do I keep askin? Answer: I worry too much (says peeps and probably Sarah-Jane herself)... Matt D's Neighbour was nearly eatern by a bullmastif... he lost half his ear (then had it sewn back on again... eww). I am glad the lil bastard did not do any more dammage... it has done enough from the sounds of it. Sorry me bein Worry wart SJ... am sure ur gettin fed up of me and am not supprised if u dump me for me goin all... fuckin psycho an stuff... Just have a phobia. Just remember I am like this cos I don't like it when ur hurt :(... Plz Come back safely. I wish there was some comfort I could give u for all the times you have felt Bored, Frustrated, in Physical pain...e.t.c. We've all been thinkin of ya ;) [Loadsa of The Crew that is] Lotsa love Xan(-hail). X.x.x.X 21:41 - Boring... Internet is fux0ring up and like... GRR. I hate the world. 21:42 - And has my opinion of the world changed... hell no... Leave me to contemplate. 21:44 - Meh... am pissin off SJ by now... *punches self* Attempts to organise sumethin with Loz. 21:47 - No Reply from Loz... Buy my feckin CD m8... am desparate! Remembers Elliot is in France... (Hopes he will accidentally meet up with Clairde Mwa ha ha ha) So I cannot try and flog the CD to him... grr

Gargh... Sadie's been attacked by a "Japanese Attack Dog". I am really worried... which wouldn't u be if a Dog came and attacked your Girlfriend... well even if it happened to a friend wouldn't you be? I keep askin cos like... dog bites are bad, and have been known to be lethal , and she assures me she is ok... I beleive her... but still I can't help worryin. Man... That Dog is dead, If I eva find it... lol... colt 45 situation !!! Anyways... erm... lil moment of life... was stuck with my relatives which is ok... but my Grandfather can be a real bastard sometimes... Y?!?!?! I am sooo annoyed with him cos he makes peeps round him upset. [ SITUATION: People come round to visit... do you: A - Tell them to go clear out your dead wifes clothes and take them home repeatedly, B - Tell them about your Rambling, Gym and Golf Repeatedly, C - Make obsene comments about their life, D - Show them a good time. (Answer = D, Grandpa does A, B and C)]. Gargh... I hate my phone now... it isn't charging... completely ran out while I was tryna assess the situation of what happened to SJ and it like decides to die on me... now it isn't charging... and like my Uncles Died and my mums is O2... meh.

Lol, If ur reading this ur probably SJ :P... Hehe... am not a German... U Frenchie/Belgie :D pmsl... love u reallies :) Plz Forgive me (^^^^) { } \__/ || || || || || `` Miss Yas! Loads :(... See ya when u get back. -- X.x.X.x.X --
Meh... I just hate myself sometimes :P... DON'T ASK! Ahh Well... Welcome to the real world Xan... Woo.

Lol, I killed another PC... This time, its not my PC agen... its Dads Laptop. Its a brand new Dell... Fux0red :P... great. I now need to pay... Â£799 :P Meh. What shall i kill now? Ians Computer? lol... nah. WHY do i kill computers when I sit 5 feet from them? what is it with me? am I a jynx... do i emit EMP? am I some sort of magnet to pc suicide? :P

Well, Am confuzed about why both me and SJ are bein asked bout how we are. e.g. " Hows it goin with SJ ?" " hows it goin with Xan ?"... WTF?!?!?! is there summut both or one of us doesn't know? It's makin us a lil uneasy I think... Well... am feeling uneasy cos like... what am I supposed to say... Peeps: Jonathan Kate Marie Chris Mel Shakira

Grr, I love these Lyrics!!!! In a darkened place, Man without a face, Count on fingers the choices he could have made. Paint a picture of, view from up above, you - and soon hes painting in blood. And that man is me, La vida perdi, Now i'm casting a shadow in front of me, Now i've drained my heart so i no longer bleed. Clip my wings and hope to fly, Wave my last goodbye. Will i be awake, hold my hand when i die, wont you try Will you take my place, burn your name in the sky (x2) Will you call to me, Just in memory, En la oscuridad te acordaras de mi. Now you turn to run uptowards the sun rise, you can't you're walking on glass. Now it's you or me Ya no creo en ti, Too late to say that you should've follwed me, Too late to burn my flesh so i longer feel. Clip my wings and hope to fly, Wave my last goodbye. Will i be awake, hold my hand when i die, wont you try Will you take my place, burn your name in the sky (x6) Woo... I just love them... shame I couldn't write anything like this... although... I really like SJ's Phantom Lyrics... they are like A+.

I am feeling really guilty as am havin an ok time this weekend and Sadie is in Worksop being bored out of her skull (as she would probably put it). I hope it isn't too bad for you this weekend, hopefully 2 days will fly past soon enough. Byez... come back soon N_.-*~ -[x.X.x.X.x]- ~*-._N
Erm... as first post I HAVE NO CLUE what to write!!!! Erm... I will have something by tomorow... when I am awake and in sober mood... although am not drinkin... arrr feck it.
